```{r}
library(ggplot2)

n=300
t1 = 1:n
t0 = seq(3, 2*n+1, 2) %% n
t2 = t0 + (t0 == 0)*n
df = data.frame(x = cos((t1-1)*2*pi/n), 
y = sin((t1-1)*2*pi/n),
x2 = cos((t2-1)*2*pi/n),
y2 = sin((t2-1)*2*pi/n))
ggplot(df, aes(x, y, xend=x2, yend=y2)) +
geom_segment(alpha=.1) + theme_void()
```

See: https://fronkonstin.com/2017/12/23/tiny-art-in-less-than-280-characters/
